jd: From: Sanjeev Sharma, Arkaya Infotech Inc sanjeev@arkayainfotech.com Reply to: sanjeev@arkayainfotech.com Cassandra DBACassandra DBA.It is a Multi – year ContractOnsite role in North Chicago. Rate – Learn what is a reasonable rate on the market today and go from therePlease send resumes first all questions will be answered only when the resume is sent PRIMARY RESPONSIBILITIES: · Design moderately complex databases, tables, stored procedures, views, triggers and other database objects.· Optimize database performance through a number of techniques including but not limited to: indexing, query optimization, database design. · Participate in periodic High Availability / Disaster Recovery tests of critical systems.· Proactively monitor database performance, capacity planning and resource consumption. · Provide day to day support for databases and database applications.· Upgrade and patch DBMS’s.· Ensure databases and database objects are backed up according to business requirements, and recovery procedures are tested and documented. QUALIFICATIONS: · Bachelor’s Degree in Information Technology or related field. · 6+ of Cassandra· Ansible automation is a must.· 10 plus years of experience in Database Management / Data Integration.· Proficient in one or more Database Management Systems (e.g. DB2i, DB2 LUW, DataStax, Oracle, SQL Server). · Familiar with one or more replication technologies (e.g. DTShare, CDC, SQL Replication, Attunity)· Ability to read a Logical Data Model a plus.
